subject: Re: [PATCH] Shadow Copy Improvements
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Jeremy Allison schrieb:
> On Tue, May 08, 2007 at 11:38:37AM +1000, Alison Winters wrote:
>> Could someone take a look at this patch, metze perhaps?  I've been
>> testing with this patch on SGI's XVM snapshot and Ed is pretty happy
>> with it on ZFS.  I really think it adds a lot of value to the current
>> snapshot module.
> 
> I'll take a look at this for 3.0.26. It's too late for 3.0.25,
> which is feature frozen, but we're hoping to be snappier in
> doing the 3.0.26 update.

thanks Jeremy:-)

metze
